Name: Hawaii
Description: The best traveling destination in the US! It is the most beautiful island around the world and it's the dream place for surfers!

Name: Honolulu
Description: The largest city in Hawaii, where also the most famous place in Hawaii to visit and contains diversified culture from different parts of the world.

Name: Pahoa
Description: Because of the active volcano Kilauea, the soil underneath Phoa is volcanic in origin. Pahoa is also well known by hippies culture and known as Big Island's Hippie Capital

Name: kihei
Description: Kihei contains numerous beaches and beach parks that are considered the one of the best in Hawaii. And there are many shops and activities for people to visit. Climate there is arid.

Name: Lihue
Description: Lihue is the government and commercial center of Hawaii and this is the second largest town in Hawaii.

Name: Kahului
Description: It contains the main airport and shipping center in Hawaii, you will always start in Kahului of your travel in Hawaii. There are also many different museum, art center, beach park here.
